import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import styles from './index.module.css' import { addMovieFavorite, removeMovieFavorite } from '../../actions' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {MdFavorite} from 'react-icons/md' import { TiDelete } from 'react-icons/ti' export default function Card({title, id, year ,img, type}) { let clicked = false const changeColor = function() { clicked = true console.log('Color Changed') console.log('this is' + clicked) } const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{type === 'fav' ?
{ dispatch(addMovieFavorite(id)) changeColor() }}/>
:
dispatch(removeMovieFavorite(id))}/>
}

{title}

{year}

) }
